setRLibPaths.description: Whether to set default paths for R libraries (including for `renv`) to avoid needing to reinstall upon codespace rebuild.

overrideTokensAtInstall.description: If true, temporarily override GITHUB_TOKEN and set GITHUB_PAT from the best available token (priority: GITHUB_PAT > GH_TOKEN > GITHUB_TOKEN) during the renv package install phase. Tokens are reset to their original values after install completes. Disable if you want to manage tokens manually.

restore.description: Whether to run package restoration using renvvv::renvvv_restore(). Default is true.

update.description: Whether to run package update using renvvv::renvvv_update(). If both restore and update are true, renvvv::renvvv_restore_and_update() is used. Default is false.

renvDir.description: Path to the directory containing subdirectories with `renv.lock` files. Defaults to `/usr/local/share/renv-cache/renv` if the environment variable is not set.

pkgExclude.description: Comma-separated list of packages to exclude from the renv snapshot restore process.

usePak.description: Whether to use `pak` for package installation.

debug.description: Whether to print debug information during package restore.

debugRenv.description: Whether to print debug information during renv restore.
